front.title: Extension of the Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) Profile for Authentication and Authorization for Constrained Environments (ACE) to Transport Layer Security (TLS)

abstract.t: This document updates the Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) Profile for Authentication and Authorization for Constrained Environments (ACE) specified in RFC 9202 by specifying that the profile applies to Transport Layer Security (TLS) as well as Datagram TLS (DTLS).
